archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0316
archimate:Requirement.documentation: We need to be able to carry forward a transitioning customers legacy credit of debit balance

properties.value: This will be just an amount that would need to be included in the first payment(s). The amount should be somehow related to a free text value (passed from transition app) including description for the customer of where it came from. This may not include for example same late roaming charges. Details how to handle this to be defined. Any charges that are not available on the moment of move will be handled in legacy

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
